action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimera makes one Ram attack, one Bite attack, and one Claw attack. It can replace the Claw attack with a use of Fire Breath if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) Piercing damage, or 18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) Piercing damage if the chimera had {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the attack roll.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 7}, reach 5 ft. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: {@actSave dex} {@dc 15}, each creature in a 15-foot {@variantrule Cone [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cone}. {@actSaveFail} 31 ({@damage 7d8}) Fire damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.
